amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide an exemption for any rule issued by the Department of Homeland Security from the provisions of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 9 printed in Part B of House Report 114-388 to provide that the term "rule" has the meaning given in section 551 of title 5, United States Code, except for a special rule as made by the Secretary of Homeland Security.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 244 (Roll no. 17).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 244 (Roll no. 17).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Cicilline.
